com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.route

Class NavigationMapRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.route.NavigationMapRoute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnMapClickListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.OnMapChangedListener, com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.routeprogress.ProgressChangeListener

    public class NavigationMapRoute
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.routeprogress.ProgressChangeListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.OnMapChangedListener, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnMapClickListener
    Provide a route using addRoutes(List) and a route will be drawn using runtime styling. The route will automatically be placed below all labels independent of specific style. If the map styles changed when a routes drawn on the map, the route will automatically be redrawn onto the new map style. If during a navigation session, the user gets re-routed, the route line will be redrawn to reflect the new geometry. To remove the route from the map, use removeRoute().

    You are given the option when first constructing an instance of this class to pass in a style resource. This allows for custom colorizing and line scaling of the route. Inside your applications style.xml file, you extend <style name="NavigationMapRoute"> and change some or all the options currently offered. If no style files provided in the constructor, the default style will be used.

    Since:
    0.4.0

    • Method Detail

      • addRoute

        public void addRoute(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute directionsRoute)
        Allows adding a single primary route for the user to traverse along. No alternative routes will be drawn on top of the map.
        Parameters:
        directionsRoute - the directions route which you'd like to display on the map
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • addRoutes

        public void addRoutes(@NonNull
                      java.util.List<com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute> directionsRoutes)
        Provide a list of DirectionsRoutes, the primary route will default to the first route in the directions route list. All other routes in the list will be drawn on the map using the alternative route style.
        Parameters:
        directionsRoutes - a list of direction routes, first one being the primary and the rest of the routes are considered alternatives.
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • setOnRouteSelectionChangeListener

        public void setOnRouteSelectionChangeListener(@Nullable
                                              OnRouteSelectionChangeListener onRouteSelectionChangeListener)
        Add a OnRouteSelectionChangeListener to know which route the user has currently selected as their primary route.
        Parameters:
        onRouteSelectionChangeListener - a listener which lets you know when the user has changed the primary route and provides the current direction route which the user has selected
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • showAlternativeRoutes

        public void showAlternativeRoutes(boolean alternativesVisible)
        Toggle whether or not you'd like the map to display the alternative routes. This options great for when the user actually begins the navigation session and alternative routes aren't needed anymore.
        Parameters:
        alternativesVisible - true if you'd like alternative routes to be displayed on the map, else false
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • removeRoute

        public void removeRoute()
        Remove the route line from the map style.
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • onMapChanged

        public void onMapChanged(int change)
        Called when a map change events occurs. Used specifically to detect loading of a new style, if applicable reapply the route line source and layers.
        Specified by:
        onMapChanged in interface com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.OnMapChangedListener
        Parameters:
        change - the map change event that occurred
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • onProgressChange

        public void onProgressChange(android.location.Location location,
                             com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.routeprogress.RouteProgress routeProgress)
        Called when the user makes new progress during a navigation session. Used to determine whether or not a re-route has occurred and if so the route is redrawn to reflect the change.
        Specified by:
        onProgressChange in interface com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.routeprogress.ProgressChangeListener
        Parameters:
        location - the users current location
        routeProgress - a RouteProgress reflecting the users latest progress along the route
        Since:
        0.4.0
